title: I\'ve recently noticed a lot of unprofessional public behavior by on duty Leland Fire members (namely smelling strongly of alcohol while looking disheveled, use of loud foul language and flipping \'the bird\' from the ambulance). All of this makes me feel unsafe in my community, is there a higher authority that these \'professionals\' report to that can handle complaints?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=6079
